lead_paragraph: Barcelona great Xavi Hernandez cannot imagine Lionel Messi leaving the Catalan club, despite the Argentine forward stalling over a new contract with the La Liga champions.

headline.print_headline: Xavi Confident Messi Will Stay at Barcelona
headline.main: Xavi Confident Messi Will Stay at Barcelona

snippet: Barcelona great Xavi Hernandez cannot imagine Lionel Messi leaving the Catalan club, despite the Argentine forward stalling over a new contract with the La Liga champions....
